sentences.en: “a policy . . . allowing for little flexibility if an important new singer comes down the pike”(&b{Christian Science Monitor})
sentences.cn: “一种…给显露头角的重要歌手很少灵活性的政策”(&b{基督教科学箴言报})

sentences.en: Everybody catches a pike, quite possibly the same one.
sentences.cn: 每人都捕获了一条梭子鱼,连大小都差不多.

sentences.en: Five years later, genghis khan's dabie - sulu ingot pike towards JinGuo oppressors.
sentences.cn: 五年后, 成吉思汗的苏鲁锭长枪指向了压迫者金国.

sentences.en: John, I'd like you to meet our client, Mr. Rex Pike.
sentences.cn: 约翰, 来认识一下我们的客户, 雷克斯.派克先生.

sentences.en: Next he caught a pike, but threw it back too.
sentences.cn: 接著他又钓到一尾肥硕的梭子鱼, 但是他还是把鱼丢回水里.

sentences.en: Of course Uncle Pike has to take care of them.
sentences.cn: 当然,派克叔叔得照料这些蔬菜.

sentences.en: Pike gave him a narrow - eyed stare and went back to work.
sentences.cn: 派克睇视了他一眼,就回去工作了.

sentences.en: Pike was puffing away at a cigarette nervously.
sentences.cn: 派克紧张不安地一口接一口抽着烟卷.

sentences.en: Some freshwater fishes such as pike can withstand levels of acidity.
sentences.cn: 一些诸如梭鱼等淡水鱼可以抵御相当程度的酸性.

sentences.en: SPOCK, A CADET AT STARFLEET ACADY, BEGINS SERVING ABOARD THE ENTERPRISE UNDER CAPTAIN PIKE.
sentences.cn: 史巴克, 星舰学院的学员, 开始在PIKE舰长指挥的[企业号]中服役.

sentences.en: Thank you for calling . Mr. Pike.
The Pike lives mainly in large rivers and lakes.
sentences.cn: 狗鱼主要生活在大江大湖中。

sentences.en: The pike measured 56 inches and weighed 55 lbs.
sentences.cn: 在屈体测五六英寸和权衡五五磅.

sentences.en: The rivers were rich in salmon and pike.
sentences.cn: 这些河流里盛产鲑鱼和狗鱼.

sentences.en: They were armed with a long spear or pike and sword.
sentences.cn: 他们装备着长矛、长枪或剑.

sentences.en: Uncle Pike is a person who knows how to enjoy life.
sentences.cn: 派克叔叔是个懂得怎样享受生活的人. )

words.tran_cn: 通行费；矛；[鱼]梭子鱼；尖头；[税收]收费道路

trans.tran_cn: 长矛，梭鱼，狗鱼，收费道路，[泳]虾式跳水
trans.tran_en: a large fish that eats other fish and lives in rivers and lakes

trans.tran_cn: 用矛刺穿，<美俚>赶路，走，<美俚>（跟着大赌客）小心谨慎的赌小钱，用长矛戳（伤，死）

trans.tran_en: to stab or pierce using a pike
